column4: I am attempting to install fftw-3.2.2 and am getting a lot of NOs on the ./configure and a couple warnings on 124 and 125 that I don't understand. anyone help please http://pastebin.com/G5Bgarbi
Why are you trying to compile it manually? There is a package for it.
I couldn't figure out how to do what you are asking
Why do you want fftw 3.2.2?
it is necessary for xoopic
install the 'libfftw3-dev' package.
ah thanks! I will try that and then the xoopic install again
I am getting an invalid operation error
What is the exact text of the error message?
kocmodpom@kocmodpom-laptop:~/Downloads$ sudo apt-get libfftw3-dev
apt-get install libfftw3-dev
doh!
oh yea, that was a lot easier, thanks! but I am still getting some NOs and warnings on 116-119 due to dfftw http://pastebin.com/ZVTXnY7e
You installed fftw, not dfftw.
I thought it was the same?
at least that is what my google search led me to believe
You probably need fftw2.
so I should try sudo apt-get install libfftw2-dev ?
Not sure -- look around in Synaptic.
apt-get install cpp-3.4
didn't work, but I found it on a download mirror
didn't work?
could not find package cpp-3.4
